title: Drawing, "Fish Motif, Textile Design", 1950–70
medium: Brush and gouache, graphite on paper, lined
inscribed: On mat, lower right, graphite: Tommi Parzinger. 320 E. 57th Street. N.Y.C.
description: Whimsical fish design on marine blue background, fish painted white with coral-colored scales.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Fish Motif, Textile Design", 1950–70.
1950–70. Brush and gouache, graphite on paper, lined. Gift of Mr. Donald Cameron. 1992-51-18.
